name: Kove - Searching / Night Thought (Vinyl)
description:
Limited to 30 copies. For international shipping outside the UK, please allow 10 days for delivery.

At just 22 years of age, Kove is already a man in demand having set the dance music scene alight with his impressive remixes of John Newman’s ‘Love Me Again’ and Chase & Status’s ‘Lost & Not Found’. Now preparing for the next step in his career, ‘Measures’ EP out on 21st October via MTA records is four irresistible tracks that confirm Kove as one of the UK’s hottest emerging talents.

Already gaining the nod of approval from the likes of RAM Records Andy C and Matrix & Futurebound, Kove demonstrates his worth on the track ‘Searching’, with its instant markings of a future house-tinged, D&B classic.

Loaded with bass and built around climatic melodies, Kove’s standout quality lies in his dynamic productions, with each track on the ‘Measures’ EP offering something fresh and new.

With backing from Chase & Status’s MTA Records who know more than a thing or two when it comes to releasing quality music, irrespective of genre, Kove’s distinctive sound is one you’ll be hearing a lot more of in 2013.

name: Josh Butler - Closer / Keep Movin' (Vinyl)
description:
Limited to 30 vinyl. For international shipping outside the UK, please allow 10 days for delivery.

Returning to MTA Records this September, the hotly-tipped Josh Butler delivers a 2 track release of robust House to follow up on his acclaimed 'Got A Feeling' from earlier this year.

With a recent remix of MTA founders, Chase & Status, latest single currently doing damage across dance floors, and a string of key DJ dates which include Secret Garden Party, Gottwood and SubSoul (Ibiza), 'Closer' drops in the midst of a busy summer for the rising Leeds based artist.

'Closer' sees Butler explore a driving house aesthetic built around an infectious groove that stems from on-point drum programming and well balanced sonics. Techy in approach but retaining a melodic edge thanks to a subtly pitched male vocal, 'Closer' is ammunition for DJs across the House spectrum. 

An artist at the forefront House Music's new wave, who already counts Maya Jane Coles, Pete Tong, B.Traits, Annie Mac, Mistajam and Waze & Odyssey as fans, Josh Butler's rise is set to continue.
